articles.author: ABP News Bureau
articles.title: David Warner Officially Retires From International Cricket, Leaves Door Open For Comeback - ABP Live
articles.description: Star Australian batter David Warner makes his retirement official through a social media post but gives an interesting update regarding his future in international cricket.
articles.content: Australian left-handed batter David Warner has officially confirmed his retirement from all formats of international cricket in a social media post. However, in a surprising twist, he has made himsel… [+2583 chars]
